section.title: Project-wide Search and Replace: Select all text flows in all documents
section.para: In a large project, a global search may return results from many different documents. When using the "Replace all selected" function, there may be too many results to manually select them all.
Zanata 1.6 introduces a "Select All" function. Now you can search through all documents in a project, then select all of the results, and replace all instances.
